activities: eCompanyStore is a preferred partner of Microsoft, operating an e-commerce platform that sells electronic software to Microsoft employees, interns & alumni worldwide. Personal information received is only relevant to orders placed by those individuals, such as name, phone, email address and billing information. Credit card data is securely transmitted solely for the purpose of completing the sales transaction and is not stored or saved electronically. eCompanyStore is a PCI compliant organization that understands the requirements surrounding personally identifiable information and remains committed to honoring those requirements.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: client, customer - includes manually processed data
